schemaArray.title: AppConfigurationCreate
schemaArray.description:
Create a new app configuration
“all_functions_enabled=True” → ignore enabled_functions.
“all_functions_enabled=False” AND non-empty enabled_functions → selectively enable that list.
“all_functions_enabled=False” AND empty enabled_functions → all functions disabled.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: Maximum number of results per response.

schema.title: Intent
schema.description: Natural language intent for vector similarity sorting. Results will be sorted by relevance to the intent.

schema.title: Intent
schema.description: Natural language intent for vector similarity sorting. Results will be sorted by relevance to the intent.

schema.title: Configured Only
schema.description: If true, only return apps that have been configured.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: Maximum number of Apps per response.

allOf.title: Function Input
allOf.description: The input parameters for the function.

allOf.title: Linked Account Owner Id
allOf.description: The owner id of the linked account. This is the id of the linked account owner in the linked account provider.

schema.title: InferenceProvider
schema.description: The inference provider, which determines the format of the function definition.

schema.title: App Names
schema.description: List of app names for filtering functions.

schema.description: Natural language intent for vector similarity sorting. Results will be sorted by relevance to the intent.

schema.title: Configured Only
schema.description: If true, only returns functions of apps that are configured.
